effect.short: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Grounds the target until it leaves battle.  Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.

flavorTexts.text:
This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in
the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to
the ground.

This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in
the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to
the ground.

This move also hits opposing Pokémon
that are in the air. Those Pokémon are
knocked down to the ground.

This move also hits opposing Pokémon
that are in the air. Those Pokémon are
knocked down to the ground.
